title: Capstone Project - Create a New Year project using Scratch Jr
question:
Background Information

Design a project using ScratchJr. It should show a scene for the new year’s celebrations. You can either use characters from the list available on ScratchJr or draw them on your own. You must include a twinkling star, a bell that shakes, and a few people in the scene. You can choose any suitable background from the ones available in the gallery.

Project Objective

Create a new year’s celebration party scene with different characters and a suitable background using ScratchJr.

Requirements

◼ Choose a suitable background and characters for decorations.
◼ Type New Year Party on the stage.
◼ Add a bell, a star and some people as characters.
◼ Program the bell to shake and ring.
◼ Program the star to twinkle.
◼ Save the project as New Year Party.
Here are some milestones for you to achieve to make this project. As you reach each milestone, submit the result to your teacher.


Additional Challenges

◼ Program one or more people in the party to dance.
◼ Program them to say Happy New Year when you tap them.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
